properties.entry:
SELECT AD_NO ,MEM_NO_AD ,AD_LOCATION ,AD_NAME ,AD_PHONE ,AD_POST ,AD_ROAD ,AD_DETAIL
FROM TB_ADDRESS_LIST WHERE AD_NO = ? AND AD_POST =? AND AD_ROAD =? AND AD_DETAIL =?
UPDATE TB_ADDRESS_LIST SET AD_NAME= ? , AD_LOCATION= ? , AD_POST= ? , AD_ROAD= ? , AD_DETAIL WHERE AD_LOCATION= ?
